name: Claude in PowerPoint
tagline: Use Claude to build, edit & refine PowerPoint presentations.
description: Claude works alongside you in PowerPoint â€” building slides, making pinpoint edits, and iterating on your deck in real time. Claude reads your layouts, fonts, and slide masters so every change stays on-brand and on-template. Claude in PowerPoint is now available on the Pro plan. It also now supports live data connectors, bringing context from your daily tools directly into your slides.

name: Straion
tagline: Manage Rules for AI Coding Agents
description: Centralized rules for Coding Agents like Claude Code, Github Copilot & Cursor. Your AI coding agent automatically picks the right rules per task. Ship enterprise-ready code at 10x speed.

name: Tidy
tagline: A personal assistant that can learn to use any app you use
description: Tidy is a personal agent that can use any app you use, so it can do everything you do. Tidy keeps you in the loop via iMessage + a persistent filesystem. It's like OpenClaw, but fully cloud hosted and you can teach it to safely use any website without touching any code.

name: Wordy
tagline: Learn languages from real movie and TV clips with quizzes
description: Ever wished you could learn a language just by watching your favorite shows? With Wordy, you can. Watch short clips from real movies and TV series, then test what you picked up with built-in quizzes. Every word you encounter is tracked automatically, so your vocabulary grows with every clip you watch.

name: Ashera AI
tagline: GTM, Run by AI
description: Ashera uses AI to analyze GTM sales calls and turns the truth into action, not generic summaries. It provides in-call guidance, extracts risks/objections/next steps after each call, updates your CRM automatically, and scores each account so teams can track deal health with clarity. The key differentiator: one source of truth across the entire sales journey, keeping everyone aligned on what was actually said. Free plans for individuals and small teams on Product Hunt, try them now

name: Verly
tagline: AI agents that resolve customer support across channels
description: Automate customer support with VerlyAI. Deploy intelligent AI agents for Web, Calls and WhatsApp in minutes. Reduce support costs and handle unlimited conversations simultaneously.

name: Remalt
tagline: AI Workspace For Content-Led Business
description: Stop paying for a dozen disconnected tools and start building your content-led business on one visual brainboard. Remalt is the infinite workspace where your videos, files, and notes meet a custom-tailored AI that actually understands your brand. Instead of generic chat boxes, you get a visual "thinking layer" to brainstorm, automate workflows, and repurpose content across LinkedIn, YouTube, and Instagram in seconds. Itâ€™s your second brain, conversion engine, and creative stackâ€”unified.

name: Cassiopeia
tagline: Turn any B2B case study pages into live product demos
description: Paste a URL and instantly get custom interactive components for any case study â€” ROI calculators, mini product demos, and animated metrics that match your page's exact look and feel.

name: Delta IQ
tagline: Shows how contract changes affect prior approvals
description: Delta IQ tracks approvals across contract versions. Existing tools compare text or store documents, but they do not preserve the decisions tied to specific clauses as agreements evolve. Delta IQ links approvals to clauses and versions. When a new amendment is uploaded, it highlights impacted provisions and shows whether prior approvals still hold or need re-review. This helps teams avoid rereading entire documents as amendments accumulate, especially in credit and risk workflows.

name: Voice Notes to Text - SotiTalk
tagline: iOS voice to text app, real-time & privacy-first
description: SotiTalk turns your voice into text in real-time. Capture ideas while walking, take meeting notes hands-free, or brain dump without typing. Get instant transcription that saves only to your device, no cloud storage of your recordings or text. No more voice notes you'll never listen to again. No more losing thoughts because typing is too slow. Just speak, get text instantly, and keep working. Your transcriptions stay on your phone. Simple, fast and private.

name: Vocal Division
tagline: Separate vocals, drums, bass & more with AI
description: Upload any song and separate it into vocals, drums, bass & instrumental using AI. Free online tool with mixer and BPM detection.

name: City Buddy
tagline: Discover everything from top attractions to hidden gems.
description: Instantly discover top attractions, hidden gems, ratings, and practical travel info for any city or country. No signup needed.

name: DryCast
tagline: Never run outside to save your laundry from rain again.
description: Sunny doesnâ€™t mean dry. Drycast uses real weather data like humidity and wind speed to predict if your laundry will dry outside today. Get a simple recommendation before you hang your clothes.

name: TIMPs
tagline: Persistent memory layer for AI agents
description: TIMPs is an open-source memory infrastructure layer for AI agents. Most LLM apps are stateless â€” they forget everything between sessions. TIMPs adds structured long-term memory, semantic retrieval, project isolation, and reflection-based storage. Built with TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and Qdrant. Developer Preview â€” designed for builders experimenting with persistent AI systems.

name: ClawCloud
tagline: OpenClaw in Cloud.
description: Run OpenClaw without the setup. Your own AI agent on WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord â€” connected to 800+ tools. Free to start, live in 60 seconds.

name: zymplio: Master your WordPress Stack
tagline: Save hours. Boost margin. Scale faster.
description: zymplio is the agency cockpit for WordPress agencies to end asset chaos. Manage licenses, code snippets, and site structures in one secure, encrypted vault. ðŸš€ Save hours: Deploy keys and logic via our "Bridge" pluginâ€”no WP login needed. ðŸ“ˆ Boost margins: Monitor your burn rate and automate setups with AI-powered CPT generation and reusable Stacks. Standardize your workflow, secure your assets, and scale faster.

name: CatsMe 2.0 â€“ AI Cat Health from a Photo
tagline: AI reads your cat's face to detect pain before it's too late
description: We launched on PH in 2025 and flopped â€” built on no-code, the UX was rough. So we rebuilt from scratch. CatsMe 2.0 reads your cat's face to detect pain using AI co-developed with Nihon University's veterinary researchers. Snap a photo, get instant health insights. No wearables needed. New: fully rebuilt tech, Feline Grimace Scale-based detection, daily health scores, multi-cat profiles, 8 languages. 31,000+ cat parents in 50 countries. Zero ads. This is our comeback.

name: Paragent
tagline: AI coding agents that ship features while you sleep
description: Paragent is a command center for AI coding agents that run in parallel on your GitHub repos. Describe what you want in plain English â€” "Add Stripe checkout to the pricing page" â€” and Paragent spins up an agent on its own git branch. It plans the implementation, writes the code, and opens a pull request. You review it on GitHub like you would with any teammate. The difference? You can launch 10 features at once. Each gets its own branch. No conflicts, no waiting.

name: Dwixel
tagline: A Unified Workspace Built For Student Teams
description: What if Google Docs and Notion had a baby â€” built for students? Dwixel is the unified workspace for teams tired of juggling apps. Docs. Kanban. Chat. Video. AI. Whiteboard. One tab. Zero setup. Just work.

name: Oculer
tagline: Generate post-ready engaging motion videos from one prompt.
description: Oculer turns a prompt into a full, post-ready motion videoâ€”up to 2 minutes long. Unlike tools that spit out 5â€“10s clips, Oculer focuses on complete short-form stories with pacing and structure. Pick a template (kinetic type, maps, data, product demos), paste your script, and export for Reels/TikTok/Shorts. Launch offer: 15 free credits to try it today.
